item.title: Run Minecraft Server on Chromebook
item.author: dave@bennettnotes.com (Dave Bennett)
item.description: So do you have a Chromebook sitting around that you have absolutely no idea what to do with? Well, if you or your buddies are minecraft junkies, then why not consider turning your Chromebook into a Minecraft server. It runs slightly faster than using your Android phone as a minecraft server, and offers a playable speed(though it can lag occasionally). [adinserter block=”5″] Now before you do this, you need to make sure that you haveÂ Ubuntu Installed on your Chromebook.
